title: How Gardner Minshew, the Jaguars' mustachioed, sixth-round rookie quarterback, became a breakout star and the NFL's most interesting man
text:
Gardner Minshew has become a breakout star in the NFL.

Minshew had an unusual route to the NFL, which included transferring three times in college and nearly quitting.

Outside of his on-field performance, he is also beloved for his mustache, sense of humor, and off-field antics.

Visit Business Insider's homepage for more stories.

Gardner Minshew is the breakout star of the NFL season.

The sixth-round rookie has played well for the Jacksonville Jaguars, but he's become a star for his iconic mustache, sense of humor, and antics off the field.

From an unusual route to the NFL, to trying to break his hand in college, to his pregame outfits, here's why Minshew has become a cult hero so early into his career.
description: Gardner Minshew has become something of a cult hero, from his iconic mustache, sense of humor, and dynamic play.
